title: Oil Spikes as Threat of US Conflict With Iran Increases
description: Crude oil rises on fears of a US conflict with Iran. Prices settled at their highest level since August. Mike McGlone reports. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Crude oil rises on fears of a US conflict with Iran. Prices settled at their highest level since August. Mike McGlone reports. (Source: Bloomberg)
